metadata.description: Proven growth strategies and tactics for social media

instagram_reels.name: Problem-Solution Hook
instagram_reels.example: If you can't lose weight, do this: Stop doing cardio and start lifting weights

instagram_reels.name: Myth-Busting
instagram_reels.example: Stop doing crunches for abs. Here's why: You can't spot-reduce fat

instagram_reels.name: List Format
instagram_reels.example: 5 exercises that burn more calories than running

instagram_reels.name: POV / Relatable
instagram_reels.example: POV: You're trying to eat healthy but your family orders pizza

tiktok_hooks.name: Pattern Interrupt
tiktok_hooks.example: Wait, what?! This burns more fat than cardio

tiktok_hooks.name: Direct Address
tiktok_hooks.example: If you're over 40 and want to lose belly fat, watch this

tiktok_hooks.name: Curiosity Gap
tiktok_hooks.hook: The thing about [topic] nobody tells you
tiktok_hooks.example: The thing about protein nobody tells you

follow_unfollow.description: Strategic following to attract ideal audience
steps: Follow their engaged followers (people who comment frequently)

engagement_pods.description: Mutual engagement groups for algorithm boost
engagement_pods.expected_results: 2-3x engagement boost in first hour (algorithm signals)

dm_outreach.description: Direct messaging for collaborations and networking

templates.collaboration: Hey {name}! Love your content on {topic}. I think our audiences would benefit from a collab. Interested in a shoutout exchange or IG Live?
templates.value_add: Hey {name}! Saw your question about {topic} in your story. I actually have a guide on this - want me to send it over?
templates.networking: Hey {name}! Fellow {niche} creator here. Would love to connect and support each other's growth!

story_engagement.description: Use stories to boost engagement and visibility
story_engagement.expected_results: 30-50% story engagement rate, higher profile visits

carousel_posting.description: Multi-slide posts for saves and engagement
carousel_posting.why_it_works: Instagram favors saves (signal of quality content)
carousel_posting.expected_results: 3-5x saves vs. single image, algorithmic boost

algorithm_factors: Engagement in first hour (comments, saves, shares)
growth_hacks: Post Reels using trending audio within 48 hours of trend
Share Reels to stories immediately after posting
Reply to all comments within first hour
Hook within first 1 second (stop the scroll)
Keep videos <30 seconds for completion rate
Reply to big accounts within first 10 minutes
Quote tweet with valuable add-on (not just retweet)
Ask for engagement at end (comment, share)
Comment on posts from bigger accounts

monday.cta: Set your goals for the week

thursday.cta: Try this and let me know

friday.cta: Tag a friend who needs this

sunday.cta: What's your goal for next week?

shoutout_exchange.how_to: Partner with account of similar size, post to stories

instagram_live.how_to: Go live together, cross-promote to both audiences

content_collaboration.expected_result: Exposure to new audience + viral potential

giveaway.how_to: Partner with 2-5 accounts, require follow all + tag friends

micro_influencer_partnerships.target: Accounts with 5K-50K followers in your niche
micro_influencer_partnerships.offer: Free product/service in exchange for post

user_generated_content.how_to: Create branded hashtag, ask permission to repost
